description: Play tic‑tac‑toe right from your chat and track turns effortlessly. Start a new game, make moves, and view the current board state anytime. Add a quick, strategic break to your workflow.

capabilities.name: make-move
capabilities.description: Make a move in the tic-tac-toe game

capabilities.name: get-game-state
